newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finnish March core inflation up 0.1 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Finnish March core inflation up 0.1 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Finnish core inflation rose 0.4 percent in March on February for a year-on-year rise of 0.1 percent, Statistics Finland said in a statement on Thursday.
The mean of five economists' forecasts for the March core inflation rate had been a 0.3 percent rise in a 0.2-0.4 percent range.
The Bank of Finland's target for the year-on-year change in the underlying rate of inflation -- its chief gauge for monetary policy -- is a rise of no more than around two percent.
